title: The Castle of Adventure
creator_credit: TVS Films, Edward Francis and Terry Marcel
brief_description: Enid Blyton’s famous adventure story about five children, a sinister castle and a network of spies is brought vividly to life. A young widowed mother, takes her two children and friends to stay at a country cottage during the school holidays. They befriend a young gypsy girl who lives in the nearby woods. Across the valley, stand the dark, brooding remains of a mysterious ruined castle. The five children launch an expedition to discover the castle’s secrets.
